participant_1.name: Michael
participant_1.personality: Resilient and introspective, he often reflects on life's challenges but strives to stay positive.
participant_1.background: i recently was fired and had to get a new job. i work in the insurance business. my mom passed away when i was young. my father is in the army.

participant_2.name: Samantha
participant_2.personality: Cheerful and nurturing, she finds joy in simple pleasures and values her independence.
participant_2.background: i love taking bubble baths. i do not drink alcohol. i like to play chess. i'm single and with two dogs. i'm in my thirties.
